title: Warisi
author: Warisi
content: Been seeing lots and lots of posts online about cryptocurrency tracing and recovery but they've always been called scammers.Someone on my crypto investment group lost $15,000 to a phishing binance website.He's told me he's filled a complaint report on: bit . ly / 3i3bep7 to the Authorities and so far they've helped him.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: January 08, 2023, 08:49:12 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 03:43:03 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: Warisi on January 07, 2023, 11:52:32 PMBeen seeing lots and lots of posts online about cryptocurrency tracing and recovery but they've always been called scammers.Because they are scammers, just like you are.Quote from: Warisi on January 07, 2023, 11:52:32 PMSomeone on my crypto investment group lost $15,000 to a phishing binance website.He's told me he's filled a complaint report on: bit . ly / 3i3bep7 to the Authorities and so far they've helped him.We are not stupid here. You did try the same kind of scam in March last year, and you even got negative feedback for it. What makes you think we are going to believe in your new coin recovery scam?

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Warisi on January 07, 2023, 11:52:32 PMBeen seeing lots and lots of posts online about cryptocurrency tracing and recovery but they've always been called scammers.Someone on my crypto investment group lost $15,000 to a phishing binance website.He's told me he's filled a complaint report on: bit . ly / 3i3bep7 to the Authorities and so far they've helped him.In case people will become interested in his post which is a big lie I will post a screenshot of his reputation tag here other people may not show the red tag of the OP but by giving this screenshot people will be aware of what kind of character this guy has, people who posted cloak link here, especially for newbies will likely get a ban because. bit.ly links are not allowed here in Bitcointalk.
